wikipedia_page.main: James Kitson, 1st Baron Airedale (22 September 1835 –  16 March 1911), PC, DSc,  was an industrialist, locomotive builder, Liberal Party politician and a Member of Parliament for the Holme Valley. He was known as Sir James Kitson from 1886, until he was elevated to the peerage in 1907. Lord Airedale was a prominent Unitarian in Leeds, Yorkshire.
